tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Recipes (
  recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  cooking_time INT,
  instructions TEXT,
  posted_by VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ingredients (
    ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    recipe_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id)
);
CREATE TABLE recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, preparation_time INT, cooking_time INT, servings INT)
CREATE TABLE ingredients (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, amount VARCHAR(50), recipe_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id))
CREATE TABLE instructions (instruction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, step_number INT, instruction_text TEXT NOT NULL, recipe_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id))

CREATE TABLE recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), cooking_time INT, servings INT) CREATE TABLE ingredients (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), quantity VARCHAR(50), recipe_id INT) CREATE TABLE instructions (instruction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_id INT, step_number INT, instruction TEXT) CREATE TABLE categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(50)) CREATE TABLE recipe_categories (recipe_id INT, category_id INT)
